ui_ux.title: Add Skip-to-Main-Content Link for Keyboard Navigation
ui_ux.description: Implement a skip-link that appears on keyboard focus, allowing users to bypass the header and navigate directly to the main dashboard content.
ui_ux.rationale: Fundamental accessibility requirement for keyboard and screen reader users.

ui_ux.title: Add Consistent Focus Ring Styles to All Interactive Elements
ui_ux.description: Apply visible and consistent focus indicator styles to all buttons in the dashboard widgets using Tailwind's ring classes.
ui_ux.rationale: Improves keyboard accessibility by making the currently focused element clearly visible.

ui_ux.title: Implement Optimistic UI with Overlay Loading for Widget Refresh
ui_ux.description: Replace full widget skeleton loading with a subtle overlay spinner when refreshing data, keeping existing data visible.
ui_ux.rationale: Reduces visual disruption and maintains context during refresh operations.

ui_ux.title: Add Contextual Help Tooltips to Dashboard Controls
ui_ux.description: Implement descriptive tooltips using a library like Radix UI or Tippy.js for all widget control buttons.
ui_ux.rationale: Helps new users understand dashboard customization features without reading documentation.

ui_ux.title: Add Keyboard Shortcuts for Power User Navigation
ui_ux.description: Implement global keyboard shortcuts (e.g., 'R' for refresh, 'Escape' to clear) using a hook like use-hotkeys.
ui_ux.rationale: Improves efficiency for power users who frequently monitor governance data.
